thread.title: Rafa Benitez Is Being Linked With A Major Premier League Job
thread.title_full: Rafa Benitez Is Being Linked With A Major Premier League Job

title: Rafa Benitez Is Being Linked With A Major Premier League Job
text:
Rafa Benitez Is Being Linked With A Major Premier League Job Mon Feb 13 2017 08:09:19 GMT+0000 (GMT) Mon Feb 13 2017 08:09:19 GMT+0000 (GMT) TheSPORTbible football 
Rafa Benitez has been linked with a shock move to replace Arsene Wenger as Arsenal manager - but the club's supporters are absolutely furious at the idea. 
Wenger has been under pressure from fans recently, and with his contract running out at the end of the season, attention has turned to who might replace the Frenchman after his two decades in charge. 
And according to the Mirror , former Liverpool and Real Madrid boss Benitez has been included in a shortlist of potential candidates, despite currently being under contract at Newcastle. Credit: Uncle Ed 
In his career, Benitez has seen his fair share of trophies, with the Europa League, Champions League and La Liga all in his cabinet - but that still hasn't stopped Arsenal fans from being outraged at the suggestion: Please don't bring Rafa Benitez's name and Arsenal hiring in the same sentence.... I respect him tho but NO!
